mapper.select: select e.emp_name as name ,count(me.member_id) as value from choose_projectname cp inner join member_meal mm on cp.mm_id=mm.mm_id inner join `member` me on me.member_id =mm.member_id inner join sys_emp e on e.emp_id=cp.emp_id where me.member_state !=1 group by cp.emp_id ;

select e.emp_name as name ,count(distinct mm.member_id) as value from choose_projectname cp inner join member_meal mm on cp.mm_id=mm.mm_id inner join `member` me on me.member_id =mm.member_id inner join sys_emp e on e.emp_id=cp.emp_id where me.member_state !=1 and mm.meal_type!="普通" group by cp.emp_id ;

select se.emp_name as name,count(distinct mm.member_id) as value from choose_projectname cp inner join member_meal mm on cp.mm_id=mm.mm_id inner join sys_emp se on cp.emp_id=se.emp_id group by cp.emp_id;

select cp.* , mm.* , me.*, tm.*, tn.* from choose_projectname cp inner join member_meal mm on cp.mm_id=mm.mm_id inner join `member` me on me.member_id =mm.member_id inner join team_meal tm on tm.team_id=cp.choose_id inner join team_projectname tn on tn.tp_id = cp.ptp_id where cp.emp_id=#{empId} and me.member_state !=1 and cp.mm_id=#{mmId} and mm.meal_type="团操"
